jdungeoncrawler

Class Sector

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdungeoncrawler.Sector

  • public class Sector
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds reference to the physical location that Entities will be residing in.

              int state)

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Sector.
        description - Description of the Sector.
        state - Numerical representation of the Sector's temperature (0 = Cold, 1 = Cool, 2 = Warm, 3 = Hot).
